DataElement.preferredName: Transurethral Prostatic Resection Prostate Gland Surgical Pathology Specimen Surgical Procedure java.util.Collection
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Surgical procedure to remove tissue from the prostate using an instrument inserted through the urethra.:The walnut shaped accessory sex gland of the male reproductive system.  It is located in the pelvis just below the bladder, surrounding the prostatic part of the urethra.  The prostate gland secretes a fluid which is part of the semen.:A field of anatomical pathology in which living tissue is surgically removed for the purpose of diagnosis and treatment.:A sample or part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis._Surgical Procedure is a diagnostic or treatment medical procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue._Java Collection Type

Concepts.definition: Prostate tissue removal via a cystoscope.

The walnut shaped accessory sex gland of the male reproductive system. It is located in the pelvis just below the bladder, surrounding the prostatic part of the urethra. The prostate gland secretes a fluid which is part of the semen.
A field of anatomical pathology in which tissue or cells removed from a living organism are macroscopically and microscopically reviewed for the purpose of disease diagnosis.

A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.

Property.preferredDefinition: Surgical Procedure is a diagnostic or treatment medical procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue.

Concepts.definition: A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.
